title: fix: deploy to production branch instead of main
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Main Stage Access
gist.blurb: We were accidentally sending apps to the rehearsal room. The bee has flipped the switch, and now your creations are live on the main stage.
gist.summary: Corrected a deployment script mismatch that sent apps to the 'preview' environment instead of 'production', ensuring custom domains work correctly.
gist.impact: Apps deployed through the unified pipeline will now correctly load on their custom domains instead of showing empty preview pages.
gist.visual_concept: A 'behind the scenes' broadcast control room metaphor. The bee is switching the feed from a monitor labeled 'TEST' to a big bright screen labeled 'LIVE'. Represents the fix from preview to production.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny headset and flipping a large lever labeled 'LIVE'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Behind the lever, a 'Preview' sign is dim, while a 'Production' sign lights up. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'WE ARE LIVE'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
